achievements.namaste_desc: An exclusive Snowchaser EMOTE for purchasing from THE ARMORY!
achievements.welcome_to_crafting_desc: Bonus Spirit for disenchanting your first card! You can craft a Rare card for 100 Spirit.
achievements.bloodborn_desc: You've unlocked all the Basic cards for one Faction! Enjoy this one-time bonus Spirit Orb!
achievements.world_explorer_desc: Congratulations on playing 1 game with each Faction! Enjoy this hard-to-get LEGENDARY rarity Faction card to bolster your Collection!
achievements.best_of_friends_desc: DUELYST is more fun with friends!
achievements.entering_gauntlet_desc: Congratulations on your first 20 ranked games! You've received a special free invitation to enter The Gauntlet!
achievements.helping_hand_desc: Congratulations on your first 10 games! A special gift just for you!
achievements.art_of_war_desc: Congratulations on your first 50 games! A humble gift on your path to greatness!
achievements.collector_supreme_desc: Congratulations on collecting all Core set Common cards! A RARE and an EPIC card to help you collect the rest!
achievements.earth_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Magmar Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Earth Sister!
achievements.key_mythron_desc: You've received your first Mystery Crate full of cosmetics! Here's a free key to open it!
achievements.storm_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Songhai Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Storm Sister!
achievements.sand_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Vetruvian Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Sand Sister!
achievements.shadow_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Abyssian Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Shadow Sister!
achievements.sun_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Lyonar Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Sun Sister!
achievements.sworn_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Neutral Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Sworn Sister!
achievements.wind_sister_desc: By earning 3 copies of six Vanar Rare Cards, you've unlocked the Wind Sister!
achievements.epic_questor_desc: Epic! Enjoy your awesome hard-to-get EPIC rarity card. You've earned it!
achievements.indomitable_spirit_desc: Exalted Questor! Bonus 100 Gold as we honor your dedication and indomitable spirit!
achievements.journeyman_questor_desc: Congratulations on completing your first Quest! Enjoy this amazing EPIC rarity card to boost your Collection!
achievements.legendary_questor_desc: Legendary! Enjoy your amazing hard-to-get LEGENDARY rarity card. You've earned it!
achievements.silver_division_desc: Now comes the next challenge -- climbing the ladder to Gold Division! A bonus Spirit Orb to help you on your way!
achievements.referral_desc: One of your referred friends just made a purchase!
achievements.wartech_general_achievement_desc: Congratulations on unlocking the {{faction_name}} Immortal Vanguard General!
achievements.early_feb_2018_login_achievement_desc: A special gift because we love you!

battle.choose_starting_hand_instructions: Click to replace up to 2 cards.
battle.unscored_game_xp_notice: Games with insufficient gameplay do not earn XP or rewards.
battle.max_practice_xp_reached_notice: Single Player and Friendly games stop rewarding XP at level 10. Play Ranked Games to earn more XP and rewards up to max level.
battle.gold_tip_button_tooltip: Tip opponent with a small amount of YOUR gold.
battle.gold_tip_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to tip with 5 of your OWN gold?

boss_battles.instructions: Defeat AI controlled Boss Decks for special rewards.
boss_battles.boss_1_desc:
Frenzy
Whenever this damages an enemy minion, it is stunned.
boss_battles.boss_1_bio: A walking mountain of ice and fury that can not be contained.
boss_battles.boss_2_desc: Whenever an enemy summons a minion, summon a 1 health clone nearby your General.
boss_battles.boss_2_bio: From the shadows come a twisted visage.
boss_battles.boss_3_desc:
Forcefield
At the start of your turn, equip a random artifact.
boss_battles.boss_3_bio: Face the power of his unlimited arsenal.
boss_battles.boss_4_desc:
Frenzy
Whenever an enemy damages or takes damage from this, teleport that enemy to a random location.
boss_battles.boss_4_bio: An ancient being that knows only madness.
boss_battles.boss_5_desc: The enemy General moves and attacks as if they are a Battle Pet.
boss_battles.boss_5_bio: He has walked the path to oblivion and now so shall you.
boss_battles.boss_6_desc:
Provoke
Cannot be damaged while other D3cepticle parts live.
boss_battles.boss_6_bio: A perfectly engineered weapon designed to destroy Mechaz0r and all those who would protect it.
boss_battles.boss_7_desc: At the start of your second turn and every turn thereafter, equip a random artifact.
boss_battles.boss_7_bio: Face the power of his unlimited arsenal.
boss_battles.boss_8_desc: Whenever Monolith Guardian destroys an enemy, it assimilates them.
boss_battles.boss_8_bio: Can you prove yourself worthy of entry into the Monolith?
boss_battles.boss_9_desc:
Flying.
Whenever this attacks or is attacked, summon a decoy nearby.  At the end of turn, teleport to a random corner.
boss_battles.boss_9_bio: A master of cunning and deception, Wu'jin has journeyed far in search of a worth adversary.
boss_battles.boss_10_desc: Whenever Solfist destroys a minion, reactivate it. At the end of Solfist's turn, deal increasing damage to himself and all nearby enemies.
boss_battles.boss_10_bio: As the Eternal Flame consumes him he has plans to take you with him.
boss_battles.boss_11_desc:
Ranged.
Attacks hit the target and all enemies around that target. Take damage equal to the total damage dealt
boss_battles.boss_11_bio: Its core fractured. Its purpose diminished. It shall share its pain with those who dare face it.
boss_battles.boss_12_desc: Whenever Orias damages an enemy, he gains +1 Attack.
boss_battles.boss_12_bio: A thaumaturge so dangerous, even The Crimson Flame had to cast him out.
boss_battles.boss_12_idol_desc: ANY minion summoned nearby this minion gains Rush.
boss_battles.boss_13_desc:
Ranged.
Whenever your opponent summons a minion, they draw a card. Whenever your opponent overdraws, summon a 3/3 Ooz
boss_battles.boss_13_bio: Cursed with boundless ambition this master of the dark arts is willing to share its power to see if you can handle what lies in the shadows of your potential.
boss_battles.boss_14_desc: At the end of each turn, deal damage to the player equal to their remaining mana.
boss_battles.boss_14_bio: A being composed of pure energy, his original visage no longer recognizable. They once craved the power to defeat the darkness and thus became the light.
boss_battles.boss_15_desc: Gains new keyword abilities as health decreases.
boss_battles.boss_15_bio: To stand before the Paragon is to face absolute retribution. The closer it comes to defeat the more terrifying its power becomes. Light shall sear across the land to abolish all darkness before it.
boss_battles.boss_16_desc:
Flying.
Deals double damage on counter attacks. Whenever this deals damage, restore that much Health to it.
boss_battles.boss_16_bio: Where there is light there must be shadow and in that void he draws strength. Capable of ripping the very essence from his foes, his spite unleashes a terrible price upon those foolish enough to face him. Strike him hard or he will hit you harder.
boss_battles.boss_17_desc:
Whenever an enemy minion dies, summon a prisoner on their space.
Kron's spells cost 2 less to cast.
boss_battles.boss_17_bio: Before his descent into madness, Kron was once the most revered templar within The Crimson Flames. Not content on simply eliminating heretics, Kron had an unusual talent for subjugating his enemies and breaking their wills until they were under his complete control.
boss_battles.boss_18_desc: Minions summoned from Megapenti's action bar gain Rebirth: Serpenti.
boss_battles.boss_18_bio: Tired of nobody taking it seriously, it decided to hit the gym and bulk up so it could unleash a future that is Serpenti.
boss_battles.boss_19_desc: Rin's minions have Grow +1/+1. Whenever Rin takes damage, summon that many wraithlings.
boss_battles.boss_19_bio: This accursed tome cannot be read but instead the power locked inside bleeds from the pages as the wielders own twisted soul is laid bare. These dark creatures hunger for the very same power as the one who holds the book, and when sated become nightmares.
boss_battles.boss_20_desc:
Ranged.
Can't move.
At the start of your turn, equip a Frost Armor artifact.
boss_battles.boss_20_bio: Frozen and ageless the Frost Tyrant abides in its glacial fortress. The titan has survived generations in the cold, kept timeless by the frigid conditions, waiting for a worthy adversary to wake it from its slumber.
boss_battles.boss_20_artifact_desc: The first time your General takes damage each turn, prevent 1 of it.  Enemies who damage your General take 1 damage.
boss_battles.boss_21_desc:
Frenzy.
Your minions have "Dying Wish: Deal 2 damage to all nearby enemies." At the start of your turn, teleport to a random location.
boss_battles.boss_21_bio: The Flameblood Trials unlock the full potential of the user causing their own blood to become volatile and destructive. They channel this fury and anger into the energy surrounding them to devastating results. Be wary of her explosive potential.
boss_battles.boss_22_desc:
Forcefield
All minions summoned from the action bar gain +2 Attack, but -2 Health.
boss_battles.boss_22_bio: A noble warrior bestowed with armor fashioned from depleted mana crystals, the Crystalline Champion shows his opponents their true mettle. The power that emanates from him cripples the weak and fuels aggression, making the fight as razor edge as his glaive.
boss_battles.boss_23_desc:
At the start of your turn, damage the enemy General equal to the amount of minions they own.
Deathwatch: Restore 1 health and deal 1 damage to the enemy General
boss_battles.boss_23_bio: Born among the Magmar where strength was heralded as prominence, Xel took his pursuit of perfect evolution one step further as he transcended even his own kind.  Feeding off the death of lesser beings, Xel sets his eyes upon you next.
boss_battles.boss_24_desc:
Ranged
At the start of your turn, take 3 damage but gain +1 Attack.
boss_battles.boss_24_bio: One of the most dangerous mercenaries known across the land. He is as ruthless as he is fearless in pursuing his marks. Underestimate him and his crew will rain punishment from the skies above. Be wary as his brother is always watching.
boss_battles.boss_24_valiant_desc:
Provoke
Ranged attackers must attack this minion first.
Can move 2 additional spaces.
boss_battles.boss_25_desc: Whenever an enemy minion is moved for any reason, summon a Kaido Asasssin behind them. Whenever a friendly minion is moved for any reason, give it +1/+1.
boss_battles.boss_25_bio: No one knows if anyone resides beneath the armor of the Shadow Lord. He silently leads his agents on the field in his deadly game of shadows. His quiet rage fuels his actions to bring a swift end to his victims. Do not make haste and watch your back or you may find a knife stuck in it.
boss_battles.boss_26_bio: A fearsome practitioner of the astral and arcane arts, Archmagus Vol once tricked Zane into betraying his fellow allies. With reckless abandon Zane will stop at nothing to avenge his fallen brethren even if it means sacrificing his own life.  You must not let this fight be his last.
boss_battles.boss_26_zane_desc: Zane has a mind of his own. Deals double damage to Vol. Zane dies if his attack exceeds 6. Your general dies if Zane dies.
boss_battles.boss_27_desc:
Cannot be targeted by spells.
Generals cannot move.
All minions summoned act like Battle Pets.
boss_battles.boss_27_bio: A master of strange toxins and paralyzing venoms makes Taskmaster Beatrix a terrifying force to reckon with.  Covering the battlefield in maddening aromas, she brings out uncontrollable behavior for all but the strongest.  Those who can resist going mad end up nearly paralyzed, leaving them at the mercy of the combatants.
boss_battles.boss_28_desc: Whenever a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a random minion and restore 3 health.
boss_battles.boss_28_bio: After having fallen in battle to an Abyssian priestess, the rogue Magmar Grym was cursed to be reborn with corrupted flesh and an unquenchable hunger for death.  Uncaring of the lives of others he feeds on both friend and foe alike to feed his rage.
boss_battles.boss_29_desc: At the start of your turn spawn an Exhuming Sand tile randomly on the board.
boss_battles.boss_29_bio: Once guardian to a long dead king, Nahlgol was reanimated by a necromancer who sought to use him for his own gain.  Gazing upon this necromancer, Nahlgol immediately drew his sword and slew him without hesitation, with it gaining the power to summon the spirits of his forgotten kingsguard.  Nahlgol now forever wanders the Akram desert in search of his fallen king.
boss_battles.boss_30_desc:
Celerity
Has +4 attack on opponent's turn. At the start of your turn, spawn a Fox Ravager.
boss_battles.boss_30_bio: Surviving the harsh winters of the Northern Whyte Mountains is an uncommon feat. Few grow stronger and fewer still revel in the sheer ferocity of nature. While some call upon animal spirits to survive, Wolfpunch instead becomes a beast of his own design, brutalizing any unfortunate enough to cross his path.
boss_battles.boss_31_desc: Whenever this takes damage, spawn a random Haunt nearby.
boss_battles.boss_31_bio: The Unhallowed has risen from the grave with a dark design to curse all of Mythron.  Not all of her tricks are devious though.  If luck is on your side, some of her twisted malcontents might even hold a treat.
boss_battles.boss_31_treat_1_desc:
Sentinel: General attacks.
Treat! Restore 5 health to the attacking General and draw a card.
Cannot attack Generals.
boss_battles.boss_31_treat_2_desc:
Sentinel: Minion summoned.
Treat! Give the minion that transformed this +2/+2 and draw a card.
Cannot attack Generals.
boss_battles.boss_31_treat_3_desc:
Sentinel: Spell cast.
Treat! Refund the mana for the spell that was cast and draw a card.
Cannot attack Generals.
boss_battles.boss_31_haunt_1_desc:
The enemy General's minions cost 1 more to play.
Dying Wish: Draw 2 cards
boss_battles.boss_31_haunt_2_desc:
The enemy General's non-Bloodbound spells cost 1 more to cast.
Dying Wish: Draw 2 cards
boss_battles.boss_31_haunt_3_desc:
The enemy General's artifacts cost 1 more to play.
Dying Wish: Draw 2 cards
boss_battles.boss_32_desc: At the start of Santaur's turn, spawn a Frostfire Elf nearby
boss_battles.boss_32_bio: Normally a cave dweller, Santaur the Terrible emerges once a year with his elves to distribute presents to the people of Mythron. This would normally be a cause for celebration if he didn't always beat the recipient to death after giving them their gifts.
boss_battles.boss_32_elf_desc:
Celerity
Dying Wish: Give the player a Holiday Gift
boss_battles.boss_32_gift_2_desc: Your Bloodbound Spell cannot be cast.
boss_battles.boss_32_gift_3_desc: Cards in your hand cost 1 less to play.
boss_battles.boss_32_gift_4_desc: Your General gains Ranged and -1 Attack.
boss_battles.boss_33_desc:
All Legion restore 3 health at the end of turn.
All killed Legion respawn in a corner at the start of turn.
boss_battles.boss_33_bio: A being not quite machine, not quite organic, Legion can divide its strengths amongst multiple clones of itself.
boss_battles.boss_33_2_desc:
All Legion gain +2 Attack.
All killed Legion respawn in a corner at the start of turn.
boss_battles.boss_33_3_desc:
All Legion can move 2 extra spaces.
All killed Legion respawn in a corner at the start of turn.
boss_battles.boss_33_4_desc:
All Legion cannot be targeted by spells.
All killed Legion respawn in a corner at the start of turn.
boss_battles.boss_34_bio: A paragon of order and unity.  Those in its presence are blessed with a deeper connection to all life.  When Harmony falls Dissonance rises.
boss_battles.boss_34_2_desc:
Frenzy
When Dissonance is spawned all minions switch allegiances and Dissonance gains +3/+3 for each of its minions that switched sides.
boss_battles.boss_35_desc:
Flying
Whenever the enemy General plays a minion, transform it into a random minion with the same mana cost.
boss_battles.boss_35_bio: A sorceress able to transcend time and space, Andromeda can bend the very fabric of reality.  She alone holds the secrets to life, the universe, and everything.
boss_battles.boss_36_desc: At the start of your turn, deal 6 damage to a random minion or General.
boss_battles.boss_36_bio: The city of Kaero is under attack from an alien invader. The only way to save the city is to pilot an experimental new mech, the Protector. Save as many lives as you can, for every building that falls, the invader grows in power.
boss_battles.boss_36_2_desc: Whenever an enemy minion dies, this gains attack equal to that minion's attack.
boss_battles.boss_36_3_desc: When this dies, The Invader gains +2/+6
boss_battles.boss_37_desc: Whenever the enemy General plays a minion, it becomes their new General.  Whenever Soulstealer dies, he inhabits the body of one of his minions.
boss_battles.boss_37_bio: Historians have spoke of a demon who haunts the Echoing Depths. While not much is known about it, there are some who claim that they returned from the Echoing Depths in a different body than the one they entered with.
boss_battles.boss_38_desc: Whenever the enemy casts a spell, gain a random keyword.  Whenever any minion is summoned it gains the keywords of its General.
boss_battles.boss_38_bio: An accomplished mage by any account, Kahlmar is known the world over for being an accomplished assassin of magic practitioners. Earning the nickname 'Spell Eater', Kahlmar possesses a unique talent for absorbing the spells cast against him and using them to grow stronger.

buddy_list.referral_program_callout_title: Earn Rewards for Inviting your Friends
buddy_list.referral_program_callout_message: Your friends start with bonus gold and you earn rewards as they battle.
buddy_list.your_friends_referral_instructions: Your friends have to use your code before playing a ranked game.
buddy_list.referral_beginner_instructions: Every friend that uses your CODE starts with +100 GOLD
buddy_list.referral_silver_instructions: For every friend that reaches SILVER DIVISION you gain +1 SPIRIT ORB
buddy_list.referral_gold_instructions: For every friend that reaches GOLD DIVISION you gain +200 GOLD
buddy_list.claim_rewards_instructions: Claim your rewards here as they become available.
buddy_list.challenge_received_title: You've been challenged to a game by:
buddy_list.challenge_sent_title: Waiting for challenge to be accepted by:

cards.faction_1_spell_roar_description: Give a friendly minion nearby your General +2 Attack.
cards.faction_1_spell_decimate_description: Destroy ALL minions that are not nearby any General.
cards.faction_1_spell_lasting_judgement_descri: Give ANY minion +3 Attack, but -3 Health.
cards.faction_1_spell_martyrdom_description: Destroy ANY minion. Restore that minion's Health to its General.
cards.faction_1_spell_lionheart_blessing_descr: Give a friendly minion, "Zeal: Whenever this minion deals damage, draw a card."
cards.faction_1_spell_circle_of_life_descripti: Deal 5 damage to an enemy minion. Restore 5 Health to your General.
cards.faction_1_spell_holy_immolation_descript: Restore 4 Health to a friendly minion. Deal 4 damage to enemies around it.
cards.faction_1_spell_divine_bond_description: Give a minion +Attack equal to its Health.
cards.faction_1_spell_aegis_barrier_descriptio: Choose a friendly minion. It can't be targeted by enemy spells. Draw a card.
cards.faction_1_spell_aerial_rift_description: Give your minions Airdrop this turn.  Draw a card.
cards.faction_1_spell_magnetize_description: Pull ANY minion to the space in front of your General.
cards.faction_1_spell_ironcliffe_heart_descrip: Transform a friendly minion into an Ironcliffe Guardian.
cards.faction_1_spell_sky_burial_description: Destroy a minion that is not nearby any General.
cards.faction_1_spell_afterblaze_description: Give a friendly minion +2/+4. If that minion has Zeal, draw a card.
cards.faction_1_spell_fighting_spirit_descript: Give all friendly minions +1 Health. Put a random Battle Pet into your action bar.
cards.faction_1_spell_lucent_beam_description: Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If anything was healed this turn, deal 4 damage instead.
cards.faction_1_spell_sky_phalanx_description: Summon three Silverguard Knights nearby your General.
cards.faction_1_spell_draining_wave_desc: Deal 4 damage to a minion AND your General.
cards.faction_1_spell_trinity_oath_desc: Draw 3 cards and restore 3 Health to your General.
cards.faction_1_spell_empyreal_congregation_de: Give friendly minions in a 2x2 area +2/+2.
cards.faction_1_spell_sanctify_desc: Give a friendly minion +1/+1 and turn its space into Hallowed Ground.
cards.faction_1_spell_channeled_breath_desc: Restore 2 Health to your General for each friendly minion.
cards.faction_1_spell_aperions_claim_desc: Destroy ALL minions in a 3x3 area and turn their spaces into Hallowed Ground.
cards.faction_1_spell_vale_ascension_desc: Summon a friendly non-token minion destroyed this game onto friendly Hallowed Ground.
cards.faction_1_spell_fortified_assault_desc: Turn an enemy minion's space into Hallowed Ground. Deal it 1 damage for each friendly Hallowed Ground.
cards.faction_1_spell_steadfast_formation_desc: Give friendly minions in a 2x2 area Provoke.
cards.faction_1_spell_dauntless_advance_desc: Your General and nearby friendly minions gain, "Takes no damage this turn."
cards.faction_1_spell_fealty_desc: Draw a card for each friendly minion nearby your General.
cards.faction_1_spell_sunstrike_desc: Deal 3 damage to enemies and restore 3 Health to friendly minions and Generals in a row.
cards.faction_1_spell_invincible_desc: Give a friendly minion with full Health +4/+4.
cards.faction_1_spell_call_to_arms_desc: Your General gains, "Minions you summon nearby gain +3/+3."
cards.faction_1_spell_conscript_desc: Summon a 1/2 Crestfallen with Zeal: Provoke in front of your General.
cards.faction_1_artifact_skywind_glaives_descr: Friendly minions nearby your General gain +2 Attack.
cards.faction_1_artifact_arclyte_regalia_descr: Your General gains +2 Attack. The first time your General takes damage each turn, prevent 2 of it.
cards.faction_1_artifact_dawns_eye_description: Your General gains +4 Attack. At the end of your turn, repair all of your artifacts to full durability.
cards.faction_1_artifact_gold_vitriol_descript: Whenever anything is healed, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
cards.faction_1_artifact_halo_bulwark_desc: Friendly minions nearby your General have Forcefield.
cards.faction_1_artifact_sunbond_pavise_desc: Friendly minions directly above and below your General gain +2 Attack and Provoke.
cards.faction_1_unit_argeon_desc: Bloodbound Spell: Give a friendly minion nearby your General +2 Attack.
cards.faction_1_unit_ziran_desc: Bloodbound Spell: Restore 3 Health to any Minion.
cards.faction_1_unit_brome_desc: Bloodbound Spell: Summon a 1/2 Crestfallen with Zeal: Provoke in front of your General.
cards.faction_1_unit_lightchaser_desc: Whenever anything is healed, this minion gains +1/+1.
cards.faction_1_unit_elyx_desc:
Provoke
Your minions and General may move an additional space
cards.faction_1_unit_sunriser_desc: Whenever anything is healed, deal 2 damage to all nearby enemies.
cards.faction_1_unit_suntide_maiden_desc: Zeal: At the end of your turn, fully heal this minion.
cards.faction_1_unit_arclyte_sentinel_desc: Opening Gambit: Give ANY nearby minion +2 Attack, but -2 Health
cards.faction_1_unit_sunstone_templar_desc: Whenever this attacks or counterattacks, it dispels that enemy
cards.faction_1_unit_grandmaster_zir_desc: When your General dies, Grandmaster Z'ir becomes your General.
cards.faction_1_unit_radiant_dragoon_desc: At the end of your turn, give a friendly minion +1 Health.
cards.faction_1_unit_fiz_desc: Opening Gambit: Restore 2 Health to anything.
cards.faction_1_unit_sunforge_lancer_desc: Whenever anything is healed, give your General +1 Attack.
cards.faction_1_unit_solarius_desc: Zeal: Draw 2 additional cards at the end of your turn.
cards.faction_1_unit_sun_sister_desc: Whenever anything is healed, put a True Strike into your action bar.
cards.faction_1_unit_scintilla_desc: Blood Surge: Restore 3 Health to your General.
cards.faction_1_unit_sunbreaker_desc: Forcefield. Your Bloodbound Spell is Tempest.
cards.faction_1_unit_excelsious_desc:
Provoke
Celerity
This minion gains +1/+1 for each time you healed anything this game.
cards.faction_1_unit_alabaster_titan_desc: Opening Gambit: If you have no spells in your deck, equip a full set of equipment.
cards.faction_1_unit_pureblade_enforcer_desc: Whenever your opponent casts a spell, this minion gains +1/+1.
cards.faction_1_unit_sunrise_cleric_desc: Opening Gambit: Turn a nearby space into Hallowed Ground.
cards.faction_1_unit_auroara_desc: Whenever you summon a minion with 2 or less Attack, this minion gains +2 Attack.
cards.faction_1_unit_war_judicator_desc: Nearby friendly minions cannot be targeted by enemy spells.
cards.faction_1_unit_decorated_enlistee_desc: While at full Health, this minion has +3 Attack.
cards.faction_1_unit_vigilator_desc:
Build: (1).
When this minion is built, give nearby friendly minions +3 Health.
cards.faction_1_unit_oakenheart_desc:
Opening Gambit: Progresses MECHAZ0R build by +20%.
Your other Mech minions have +1/+1.
cards.faction_1_unit_prominence_desc: Blood Surge: Summon a Silverguard Knight nearby your General.
cards.faction_1_unit_ironcliffe_monument_desc:
Build: (2).
Whenever you summon a minion nearby this, transform that minion into an Ironcliffe Guardian.
cards.faction_1_unit_surgeforger_desc: Whenever you summon a minion nearby this minion, give them both +1/+1.
cards.faction_2_spell_blink_description: Teleport a friendly minion up to 2 spaces.
cards.faction_2_spell_arcane_heart_description: Summon a Heartseeker nearby your General.
cards.faction_2_spell_saberspine_seal_descript: Give a minion or General +3 Attack this turn.
cards.faction_2_spell_mist_dragon_seal_descrip: Give a friendly minion +1/+1 and teleport it anywhere.

collection.deck_save_error_msg: There was a problem saving your deck. Please try again.
collection.deck_save_no_general_error_msg: You cannot save a deck without a general.
collection.artifact_desc: Artifacts may be applied to your general to grant bonuses and special abilities. A general may wield up to 3 artifacts at a time. Artifacts remain active until replaced or destroyed.
collection.general_desc: Generals command your minions and cast your spells. Each general has a unique Bloodbound Spell that may be reused throughout a battle. Destroy the enemy general to win the game!
collection.minion_desc: Minions may be played to the battle field nearby any other friendly minion. Minions begin their first turn exhausted, but may move and attack at least once on each subsequent turn, and remain active until killed.
collection.spell_desc: Spells may be played to the battle field to activate the spell's text. Spells do not remain active after activation.

common.start_error_message_generic_please_retry: Oops... there was a problem processing your request. Please try again.

cosmetics.cardback_desc: Set your card back per-deck in your Collection, and show it off in-game!
cosmetics.scene_desc: Custom splash art for your Duelyst Main Menu.
cosmetics.icon_desc: Icon to show off in-game, in your Profile, and in your buddy list.
cosmetics.common_mystery_crate_4: Common Mystery Crates guarantee 1 Rare (or better) Cosmetic Item.
cosmetics.rare_mystery_crate_4: Rare Mystery Crates guarantee at least 1 Epic (or better) Cosmetic Item and 1 Rare (or better) Prismatic Card.
cosmetics.epic_mystery_crate_4: Epic Mystery Crates guarantee at least 1 Legendary Cosmetic Item and 2 Rare (or better) Prismatic Cards.
cosmetics.generic_mystery_crate: Gift Crates may contain any random assortment of currency, cosmetic items, cards, and more!
cosmetics.scene_magaari_desc: A location in the world of Duelyst.
cosmetics.scene_obsidian_woods_desc: A location in the world of Duelyst.
cosmetics.scene_frostfire_festival_desc: A location in the world of Duelyst.
cosmetics.scene_city_of_kaero_desc: A location in the world of Duelyst.
cosmetics.scene_unearthed_prophecy_desc: A location in the world of Duelyst.
cosmetics.skin_argeon_m2_desc: Claimed the Lyonar throne by bloodright in the bloody aftermath of the Battle of God's Heel.
cosmetics.skin_ziran_m2_desc: Found in Akram as a young child by Argeon. Raised by the Sunforge family as Argeon's ward.
cosmetics.skin_kaleos_m2_desc: Uniquely born from the twilight mists. Received his first Sandshield from Starhorn.
cosmetics.skin_reva_m2_desc: She's fused with the Spirit Dragon, having received the most valued piece from Kaleos's Sandshield.
cosmetics.skin_zirix_m2_desc: During his own Melding, his Sandshield seared and permanently damaged his face.
cosmetics.skin_sajj_m2_desc: Zirix altered the Melding to produce the first Sandshield without the need for an organic body.
cosmetics.skin_lilithe_m2_desc: Four hundred years old. A sister of Vetruvia's House Khaleem during the Second Vetruvian Wars.
cosmetics.skin_cassyva_m2_desc: Over four hundred years old. Originally the leader of the Five Fanblades of Akram.
cosmetics.skin_vaath_m2_desc: Builder of the Amberhorn Citadel, inviting all sentient creatures on Magaari to join him.
cosmetics.skin_starhorn_m2_desc: Wove the location of Deladriss Peake into the sacred song, the Dance of Dreams.
cosmetics.skin_faie_m2_desc: First of the Aperion Bloodbound, first of the Hawkwolf.
cosmetics.skin_kara_m2_desc: Honored as the protector of the mythic Winterblade, which carries Songweaver Eurielle’s secret.
cosmetics.skin_faie_festive_desc: Faie is ready for the Frostfire Festival!
cosmetics.skin_zirix_festive_desc: Zirix is ready for the Frostfire Festival!
cosmetics.skin_zyx_festive_desc: Zyx is ready for the Frostfire Festival!
cosmetics.skin_brome_m2_desc: Brome is pumped up and ready for battle!
cosmetics.skin_shidai_m2_desc: Shidai is pumped up and ready for battle!
cosmetics.skin_ciphyron_m2_desc: Ciphyron is pumped up and ready for battle!
cosmetics.skin_ragnora_m2_desc: Ragnora is pumped up and ready for battle!
cosmetics.skin_maehv_m2_desc: Maehv is pumped up and ready for battle!
cosmetics.skin_ilena_m2_desc: Ilena is pumped up and ready for battle!
cosmetics.cardback_azurite_desc: Every sixty years is born the Silver Azurite Lion.
cosmetics.icon_abyssal_crawler_desc: Carrying a darkness to share with the world.
cosmetics.icon_cassyva_desc: The oldest of all the Bloodbound.
cosmetics.icon_wraithling_desc: Cuteness as boundless as their numbers.
cosmetics.icon_argeon_desc: Adopted Cub of the House of Highmayne.
cosmetics.icon_argeon_mk2_desc: Third in line after his two rightful brothers.
cosmetics.icon_lightchaser_desc: A beacon of hope in the darkness.
cosmetics.icon_silverguard_knight_desc: Courage only exceeded by the thickness of their armor.
cosmetics.icon_suntide_maiden_desc: Upon golden wings, their fiery resolve turns the tide.
cosmetics.icon_windblade_adept_desc: Few as skilled, none as loyal.
cosmetics.icon_ziran_desc: The Cub of the Sunforge family.
cosmetics.icon_elucidator_desc: Their birthing is an explosive event.
cosmetics.icon_makantor_desc: The envy of any natural earthquake.
cosmetics.icon_phalanxar_desc: 'I'd hate to be the nail to that hammer.'
cosmetics.icon_silithar_elder_desc: Carrying untold generations with each new birth.
cosmetics.icon_starhorn_2_desc: The Seventh Star foretold by the prophecy.
cosmetics.icon_vaath_desc: Tamer of the wild Makantor beasts.
cosmetics.icon_young_silithar_desc: Measuring age not in years, but in lives.
cosmetics.icon_grincher_desc: Military advisor to the many Houses of Mythron.
cosmetics.icon_helm_mech_desc: A good head on its shoulders.
cosmetics.icon_hydrax_desc: Two heads are better than one.
cosmetics.icon_hydrax_2_desc: Five heads are better than two.
cosmetics.icon_ion_desc: Holding in its heart a sword that shoots pure energy.
cosmetics.icon_rook_desc: 'I should be valued at five pawns.'
cosmetics.icon_z0r_desc: 'Put MECHA in front of my name!'
cosmetics.icon_songhai_crest_desc: 'Anything is possible, in the shadow of the infinite.'
cosmetics.icon_gorehorn_desc: The unseen attack is death's gate opened.
cosmetics.icon_zendo_desc: 'Empty your mind, and you are ready for anything.'
cosmetics.icon_heartseeker_desc: Finding a way into your heart, be it a kiss or blade.
cosmetics.icon_kaido_assassin_desc: 'The blade is my brush, blood my ink.'
cosmetics.icon_kaleos_desc: 'When our mind is compassionate, it is boundless.'
cosmetics.icon_reva_desc: 'We do not exist for the sake of something else.'
cosmetics.icon_reva_mk2_desc: 'We exist for the sake of ourselves.'
cosmetics.icon_scarlet_viper_desc: The viper's tongue will slay you.
cosmetics.icon_tusk_boar_desc: 'We die, and we do not die.'
cosmetics.icon_widowmaker_desc: It's never the blade you see coming.
cosmetics.icon_arctic_displacer_desc: As sudden as a blizzard, as numbing as snow.
cosmetics.icon_draugar_lord_desc: Draconian in spirit, ebullient in life.
cosmetics.icon_warbird_desc: Detects a single drop of blood in the wounded sky.
cosmetics.icon_faie_desc: From a hawkwolf, transformed by Aperion.
cosmetics.icon_faie_mk2_desc: The first generation of the Aperion Bloodbound.
cosmetics.icon_glacial_elemental_desc: The deadliest blizzard begins with a snowflake.
cosmetics.icon_iceblade_dryad_desc: We strike as the heart of the forest.
cosmetics.icon_snowchaser_desc: Each as varied as an individual snowflake.
cosmetics.icon_wolfraven_desc: 'Earth is my refuge, the sky my home.'
cosmetics.icon_mirage_master_desc: None have survived to see its true face.
cosmetics.icon_sajj_desc: Created by Zirix. The first true scion in centuries.
cosmetics.icon_starfire_scarab_desc: Devours the star dust of the night sky.
cosmetics.icon_zirix_desc: 'Aestaria will never set foot on Vetruvian soil again.'
cosmetics.emote_hm_happy_desc: Let your joy bubble to the surface!
cosmetics.emote_ziran_sunglasses_desc: Sunforge can get a bit sunny.
cosmetics.emote_reva_sad_desc: Not in the mood right now...
cosmetics.emote_reva_bow_desc: It is wisdom which is seeking for wisdom.
cosmetics.emote_reva_sunglasses_desc: Need a break from Killing Edge.
cosmetics.emote_sajj_sunglasses_desc: Helps in the blistering heat of Akram.
cosmetics.emote_cassyva_angry_desc: Do you want another Shadow Nova?
cosmetics.emote_cassyva_sunglasses_desc: Harder to see in the dark...
cosmetics.emote_starhorn_love_desc: My heart goes out to you.
cosmetics.cosmetic_crafting_error_msg: There was a problem crafting this item.

factions.faction_1_resign_statement: I concede this battle to you!
factions.faction_1_taunt_f3: Our roar will turn your cities to dust!
factions.faction_1_taunt_f4: Our sun casts away all shadows.
factions.faction_1_taunt_boss: Your hollow armor means nothing to us.
factions.faction_1_response_f2: Fire will only fuel our might!
factions.faction_1_response_f3: You are no match to our blades!
factions.faction_1_response_boss: You'll enjoy the taste of our steel.
factions.faction_2_taunt_neutral: Today you will taste your own blood.
factions.faction_2_taunt_f1: Melt inside your armor of gold!
factions.faction_2_taunt_f4: See you on the other side.
factions.faction_2_taunt_f5: Today you will taste your own blood.
factions.faction_2_taunt_boss: Our blades will tear out your insides!
factions.faction_2_response_neutral: You'll never see the blade coming.
factions.faction_2_response_f1: Still taking your first step, little cub!
factions.faction_2_response_f2: You'll never see the blade coming.
factions.faction_2_response_f4: Don't burn yourself in the darkness.
factions.faction_2_response_f5: This marks the end of your journey.
factions.faction_2_response_boss: Did no one teach you the danger of the flame?
factions.faction_3_taunt_neutral: Witness the fury of the sands!
factions.faction_3_taunt_f1: Your armor is nothing to the sands!
factions.faction_3_taunt_f2: The raging winds will erase your flames!
factions.faction_3_taunt_f3: Witness the fury of the sands!
factions.faction_3_taunt_f4: We will bury you beneath our tombs.
factions.faction_3_taunt_boss: The sands of time have deemed you unworthy!
factions.faction_3_response_neutral: Sands of time, obey my command!
factions.faction_3_response_f1: Sands of time, obey my command!
factions.faction_3_response_f3: Sands of time, obey my command!
factions.faction_3_response_f6: Sands of time, obey my command!
factions.faction_4_taunt_neutral: We will deliver you to your deathbed.
factions.faction_4_taunt_f1: Your pride hides in our shadows!
factions.faction_4_response_boss: Shadows fear neither teeth nor claw.
factions.faction_5_taunt_f2: We are powerful beyond your dreams.
factions.faction_5_taunt_f4: Your corruption will spread no further.
factions.faction_5_taunt_boss: We've come to collect your debts.
factions.faction_5_response_f1: Your ancestors paid a debt to us.
factions.faction_6_taunt_neutral: Frostbite will tear away your strength!
factions.faction_6_taunt_f2: Frost will quell your feeble flames!
factions.faction_6_taunt_f3: You know nothing of the elements!
factions.faction_6_taunt_f5: Frostbite will tear away your strength!
factions.faction_6_taunt_f6: This battle will be one sided.
factions.faction_6_taunt_boss: The long winter comes for you!
factions.faction_6_response_neutral: Cross the ice veil and see the truth.
factions.faction_6_response_f1: Be careful where you tread, lions.
factions.faction_6_response_f6: Cross the ice veil and see the truth.
factions.faction_6_response_boss: Don't get cold feet on me.
factions.boss_neutral_taunt: I will show you the meaning of fear!
factions.boss_2_taunt: Two can play at this game.
factions.boss_3_taunt: Come, let me show you all the pain in my arsenal!
factions.boss_4_taunt: Madness will rule this world.  I will destroy everything!
factions.boss_5_taunt: Your mind is clouded.  Come closer.  Let me end your pain.
factions.boss_6_taunt: Sentient life detected.  Executing eradication procedure.
factions.boss_8_taunt: Halt! Your entry into the Monolith has been denied.
factions.boss_9_taunt: Fall for my tricks or my staff, the outcome will be the same.
factions.boss_10_taunt: I shall reap the sins of this world and cleanse it in the fires of destruction.
factions.boss_11_taunt: I may be broken, but you I will shatter.
factions.boss_12_taunt: You stand before a god.  Your trivial life means nothing to me.
factions.boss_13_taunt: Can you handle even a taste of the power that I wield? Let's see you try.
factions.boss_15_taunt: The path of the light that I tread shall illuminate your demise.
factions.boss_16_taunt: Your magic, minions, and weapons are all a crutch of your weakness.
factions.boss_18_taunt: Don't talk to me or Serpenti ever again.
factions.boss_19_taunt: Patience little ones, regain your strength and devour them!
factions.boss_20_taunt: I don't want to change the world. I just want to leave it colder.
factions.boss_21_taunt: May your ashes blow away and leave nothing behind.
factions.boss_22_taunt: Reflect on the decisions that got you here. Clearly mistakes were made.
factions.boss_23_taunt: The only cure for weakness is eradication.
factions.boss_24_taunt: You can run, but you will only die tired.
factions.boss_26_taunt: Too scared to face me alone?
factions.boss_27_taunt: I will be the very best!
factions.boss_29_taunt: You are unworthy to stand upon the sands of my kingdom.
factions.boss_30_taunt: I will chew on your bones.
factions.boss_31_taunt: Let's see if I have enough tricks.
factions.boss_34_taunt: Your life is nothing but chaos and turmoil.  I shall end your life and show you true serenity.
factions.boss_35_taunt: This world is an illusion.  Nothing is as it seems.
factions.boss_37_taunt: Your soul is mine to command.
factions.boss_38_taunt: Your magic is useless here, pawn!
factions.generic_concede: I concede this battle to you!

game_setup.must_select_deck_and_opponent_message: You must select your deck and an opponent!
game_setup.battle_map_choose_tooltip: The Battle Map you choose will be used when you are player one.
game_setup.battle_map_saved_success_msg: Your Battle Map has been saved!

game_tips.novice_tip_0: Occupying a Mana Spring gives you +1 bonus Mana for that turn.
game_tips.novice_tip_1: Up to 3 Artifacts can be equipped at one time.
game_tips.novice_tip_2: Your minions will always counterattack, even if they get destroyed.
game_tips.novice_tip_3: Use Practice Mode to hone your skills with a new Faction.
game_tips.novice_tip_4: Earn rewards for completing Solo Challenges.
game_tips.novice_tip_5: You can gain Faction XP up to level 10 in practice mode.
game_tips.novice_tip_6: Reach Rank 20 and you'll be rewarded with a Loot Crate containing prizes at the end of the season!
game_tips.novice_tip_7: Reach Rank 10 and you'll be rewarded with a new LEGENDARY card at the end of the season.
game_tips.novice_tip_8: Every month, rank up in Ranked Ladder to earn better monthly rewards.
game_tips.novice_tip_9: Allies can move through each other, but not through enemies.
game_tips.novice_tip_10: Bonus chevrons are awarded for each rank achieved at the end of the previous season.
game_tips.novice_tip_11: Look at ALL cards in the entire set by enabling Crafting Mode.
game_tips.novice_tip_12: You earn +20 Gold for your first Win of the Day.
game_tips.novice_tip_13: Card Rarity: COMMON, RARE, EPIC and LEGENDARY.
game_tips.novice_tip_14: 5 Divisions: BRONZE, SILVER, GOLD, DIAMOND AND S-RANK.
game_tips.novice_tip_15: Win Streaks begin start in SILVER and end in DIAMOND.
game_tips.novice_tip_17: Once you enter a new Division, you cannot drop to the previous division for that season.
game_tips.novice_tip_18: Playing online matches earn you Faction XP.
game_tips.novice_tip_19: Gauntlet decks consist of exactly 30 cards.
game_tips.novice_tip_20: You gain another Gauntlet Ticket to start a new run at 7 wins or above.
game_tips.novice_tip_21: You can replace each quest once per day.
game_tips.novice_tip_22: Your units can move up to 2 spaces.
game_tips.novice_tip_23: You can replace one card per turn, every turn.
game_tips.novice_tip_24: Replacing a card never returns the same copy of that card.
game_tips.novice_tip_25: You can change your username once per month.
game_tips.novice_tip_26: All cosmetics can be crafted with Spirit.
game_tips.novice_tip_27: Cards drawn past the hand limit are destroyed.
game_tips.novice_tip_28: Join a tournament to get exclusive rewards: prestige emotes, ribbons, titles.
game_tips.novice_tip_29: Each card in a Spirit Orb has a chance to automatically upgrade to its Prismatic version.
game_tips.novice_tip_30: Prismatic Cards are special, rarer, shinier versions of existing cards.
game_tips.novice_tip_31: You gain 1 Mana at the start of your turn, up to max of 9.
game_tips.novice_tip_32: You can mute an opponent by clicking on their portrait.
game_tips.novice_tip_33: You start with an extra mana crystal as Player 2.
game_tips.novice_tip_34: Unlock over a dozen Hidden Achievements as you play more matches.
game_tips.novice_tip_35: You earn a Faction Ribbon for every 100 wins with that faction.
game_tips.novice_tip_36: Watch your own replays in your Profile Match History.
game_tips.novice_tip_37: The Battle Log shows you all previous card plays during your match.
game_tips.novice_tip_38: Actions are made of movements followed by attacks, you cannot attack and then move.
game_tips.medium_tip_0: Consider replacing at the START of your turn to expand your strategic options.
game_tips.medium_tip_1: Minions with AIRDROP can be summoned anywhere on the battlefield.
game_tips.medium_tip_2: Minions with BLAST deal damage to all enemies in a straight line.
game_tips.medium_tip_3: Minions with CELERITY can be activated TWICE per turn.
game_tips.medium_tip_4: Minions with DEATHWATCH trigger whenever ANY minion dies.
game_tips.medium_tip_5: Minions with DYING WISH trigger AFTER they're destroyed.
game_tips.medium_tip_6: Minions with FLYING can move anywhere on the battlefield.
game_tips.medium_tip_7: Minions with FRENZY can hit all nearby enemies simultaneously.
game_tips.medium_tip_8: Minions with PROVOKE force nearby enemies to attack them first.
game_tips.medium_tip_9: Minions with REBIRTH leave behind an egg that hatches before your next turn.
game_tips.medium_tip_10: Minions with RUSH are activated right upon entering play.
game_tips.medium_tip_11: Minions with GROW will gain stats at the beginning of your turn.
game_tips.medium_tip_12: Reach Rank 10 and you'll be rewarded with a new LEGENDARY card at the end of the season.
game_tips.medium_tip_13: Consider replacing at the START of your turn to expand your strategic options.
game_tips.medium_tip_14: ZEAL minions need to be near your General to maximize their potential.
game_tips.medium_tip_15: Minions with OPENING GAMBIT trigger right BEFORE they enter play.
game_tips.medium_tip_16: Your General's Artifact is destroyed upon receiving damage three times.
game_tips.medium_tip_17: BLAST minions will receive counterattacks from RANGED minions.
game_tips.medium_tip_18: Dervishes summoned by your Obelysks disappear at the end of your turn.
game_tips.medium_tip_19: Effects that only target minions will not apply to Generals.
game_tips.medium_tip_20: Minions with FRENZY are only counterattacked by their attack target.
game_tips.medium_tip_21: Minions with INFILTRATE gain a bonus while on your opponent's side of the battlefield.
game_tips.medium_tip_22: Star's Fury won't summon Dervishes on spaces that are already occupied.
game_tips.medium_tip_23: Dispelling a STUNNED minion will remove STUN, allowing it to move and attack.
game_tips.medium_tip_24: Transforming units does not activate REBIRTH or DYING WISH.
game_tips.medium_tip_25: Use your allies to block movement of your enemies.
game_tips.medium_tip_26: Your minions lose the ZEAL buff when they're not adjacent to your General.

modifiers.blast_def: Attack all enemy minions and Generals in one straight line.
modifiers.blood_surge_def: Triggers an effect after you activate your Bloodbound Spell.
modifiers.bond_def: Triggers an effect when summoned if you have another minion from the same tribe.
modifiers.celerity_def: This minion may activate twice per turn.
modifiers.deathwatch_def: Triggers effect whenever ANY minion dies.
modifiers.destructible_def: Artifacts have 3 Durability. Whenever your General takes damage, it loses 1 Durability. It's destroyed at 0 Durability.
modifiers.dying_wish_def: Triggers an effect when this minion dies.
modifiers.ephemeral_def: Only exists until end of turn.
modifiers.exhuming_sand_def: Summons a 2/2 Iron Dervish when its owner summons a minion from their action bar
modifiers.forcefield_def: Cancel the first damage taken each turn.
modifiers.frenzy_def: When attacking in melee range, simultaneously strike all other nearby enemies.
modifiers.grow_def: Gets bigger at the start of your turn.
modifiers.hallowed_ground_def: Restores 1 Health to friendly minions and Generals standing on it at the end of owner's turn
modifiers.infiltrate_def: Gains a bonus while on the enemy side of the battlefield.
modifiers.opening_gambit_def: Triggers an effect when summoned from your action bar.
modifiers.primal_flourish_def: Friendly minions standing on it have "Grow: +2/+2"
modifiers.ranged_def: Attack from anywhere on the battlefield.
modifiers.rebirth_def: When this dies, it leaves behind a 0/1 Egg that hatches into the same minion before your next turn.
modifiers.sentinel_def: Summoned as a 3/3 with no abilities. Will transform into its true form if a specific event occurs on opponent's turn.
modifiers.shadow_creep_def: Deals damage to enemy minions and Generals standing on it at the end of owner's turn
modifiers.structure_def: This minion cannot move or attack.
modifiers.stunned_def: Stunned minions lose their next action.
